title:
Three-Berry Dessert Pizza
ACTIVE TIME
10m
TOTAL TIME
25m
8 servings
directions: Preheat the oven to 450 degrees F. Grease a cookie sheet or line with parchment paper.

Using floured hands, pull and stretch the dough into a large oval, about 8 inches wide and 10 inches long. Place on the prepared pan. Brush the butter over the dough and bake in the oven till golden and bubbly, about 15 minutes.
Spread a layer of the chocolate-hazelnut spread over the dough. Top with the berries.
Dust with confectioners’ sugar, if desired. Serve immediately.
Tip: Let the dough sit out at room temperature for at least an hour. It will be easier to work with and bake better than cold dough.
ingredients: One 16-ounce ball frozen or fresh pizza dough (if frozen, thawed)
1/2 quart strawberries, washed, hulled and sliced
